name: FollowUpForAboveNormalBMI
title: Follow Up for Above Normal BMI
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a follow-up for a body mass index (BMI) above normal measurement.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Intervention or Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a follow-up for above normal body mass index (BMI).),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
